document.full_text: dominic orr of aruba networks says companies would save a lot of time in problem-solving if people could say of themselves, 'oh, i was momentarily stupid; let's move on.'
document.title: corner office: dominic orr: yes, everyone can be stupid for a minute
lines_and_colors: dominic orr of aruba networks says companies would save a lot of time in problem-solving if people could say of themselves, 'oh, i was momentarily stupid; let's move on.'
